Chinese.Description: 你的四肢变成八条蛛腿，你可以像蜘蛛一样移动，吃蜘蛛能食用的食物，但你现在只能用嘴叼着一件东西。蜘蛛将不再敌视你，但是，闪光果和烟雾果对你是致命的。

English.Description: Your limbs become eight spider legs, and you can move like a Big Spider and eat food that the Big Spider can eat, but now you can only hold a thing in your mouth. Spiders and Big Spiders will no longer be hostile to you, but Flare Bomb and Spore Cloud are deadly to you.
